summary: Makes the alchemist's shack fit for any type of Dovah and their partner.
descriptionHtml:
[center][youtube]fJ82VQkH2DE[/youtube][/center]
[u]Description[/u]
[i]Originally for myself so it may not suite everyone's taste.[/i]
This mod alters the alchemist's shack located in Aspen Forest.
The goal was to expand on the already well done shack to allow players and their companions to live in it as well as provide them everything they would need.

Adds/Includes:

-Armor workbench
-Weapon grindstone
-Smelter
-Tanning Rack
-Blacksmith Forge
-An extra bed
-Enchanting table
-Storage chests
-Cooking stand
-Enlarges the shack
-And more

Hope you enjoy it!

[u]Also check out[/u]
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21659/]Craftable Crossbows & Bolts[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21661]Crossbow Bolts For Vendors[/url]
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56811/]Better Alchemist's Shack[/url]
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22029/]Arrows of Might for NPCs[/url]
author: remnantsoldier
